arts.ttl: Birmingham City key man must tread carefully to avoid Chris Davies' unwanted scenario
arts.sum: Birmingham City welcome Lincoln City to St Andrew's this afternoon for game number 34 in their League One season The second yellow card amnesty of the season is on the horizon, which means players who are close to the limit of cautions which they can afford to pick up must be especially careful until that deadline passes.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies reacts to Jay Stansfield penalty decision after Kieran Dowell clinches win
arts.sum: Chris Davies reacts to Jay Stansfield penalty decision after Kieran Dowell clinches win Top scorer Jay Stansfield has scored seven of his eight penalties this season but he passed up spot-kick duties to Dowell when Tomoki Iwata was fouled in the second half of Saturday’s game at St Andrew’s @ Knighthead Park.

arts.ttl: Birmingham extend lead at top of League One with narrow Lincoln win
arts.sum: Blues dominated the opening stages but could not capitalise on their control.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City have missed out on Leeds magic and transfer exit is inevitable
arts.sum: Frustratingly, Roberts has failed to score in 22 appearances for Northampton this season and recently returned from a two-month injury lay-off. Roberts, who made two cup appearances for Blues in August, isn’t likely to force his way back into the fold under Davies when the club returns to the Championship having faltered in the third tier with the Cobblers.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City have one option with Bailey Peacock-Farrell before Lincoln - Brian Dick
arts.sum: That isn’t likely to help Peacock-Farrell or Blues who have to rely on the goalkeeper for the time being. Admittedly, Peacock-Farrell’s first season at Blues hasn’t gone to plan, but he now has a vital role to play in the run-in that nobody saw coming.

arts.ttl: 'Die by a thousand cuts' - League One boss sums up Birmingham City problem - Birmingham Live
arts.sum: “We're still trying to get a few points on the board and keep pushing as much as we can but there's no doubt it's going to be the toughest place to go this season, for all League One teams. Skubala insists his team might sit a little deeper than normal but not employ the match-long ‘low block’ that has often faced Chris Davies’ men this season.

arts.ttl: Saturday's League One predictions including Birmingham City vs. Lincoln City
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Birmingham City vs. Lincoln City.

arts.ttl: Stansfield starts: Birmingham City team news and predicted XI to face Lincoln City
arts.sum: The latest Birmingham City team news as Chris Davies' side gear up to face Lincoln City in League One this Saturday. The post Stansfield starts: Birmingham City team news and predicted XI to face Lincoln City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Marc Leonard returns but Birmingham City could be without six players for Lincoln
arts.sum: Davies was also positive on the condition of Keshi Anderson, who has missed Blues' last three matches with a hamstring injury, and goalkeeper Ryan Allsop. Chris Davies was more positive on Birmingham City's injury situation at his pre-Lincoln City press conference with Marc Leonard available and Jay Stansfield in contention to start again.

arts.ttl: Chris Davies finally gets the credit after four separate Birmingham City snubs
arts.sum: Birmingham City manager Chris Davies has finally seen his work recognised with an award Birmingham City manager Chris Davies has finally won the League One manager of the month award.
